revised_title: A Detailed Account of an Extraordinary Hailstorm in Chester and Surrounding Areas
tldr: This letter from Mr. Halley describes an extraordinary hailstorm that occurred in Chester and surrounding areas on April 29th, 1695. The hailstones were large and caused significant damage to windows, crops, and livestock. The author also discusses the unusual weather phenomenon and the possible reasons for the hailstones' size and shape.
